resources.string: Expandable/Collapsible Views (text, images, etc.) in Android are useful when we want to display all the available options on one screen, without the user having to scroll all the way to fi nd the one he/she is interested in. What we are doing is trying t o maximize the use of the available space on the screen by giving an overall view of its content. The Android SDK provides the Expan dableListView class, but sometimes that option is overkill or unfit for our intents purposes, and we may decide to roll out our own mechanism.
